name: Pepper Chicken Paratha Bowl
description: This Pepper Chicken Paratha Bowl is a delectable fusion of flavors, perfect for those who appreciate a high-protein, high-fiber, and healthified meal. With a savory blend of ground black pepper, fresh thyme, and gourmet tinapa, paired with the freshness of tomato, red onion, and radish, this dish offers a nutritious yet delicious option for your meal plans. The incorporation of skinless boneless chicken thigh ensures a rich protein intake, while the paratha adds a delightful carb counterpoint, making this bowl not just healthy but also incredibly satisfying.

recipeInstructions.text: Start by prepping your ingredients: Dice the tomato, finely slice the red onion, grate the Parmesan cheese, slice the radish, thinly slice the leek, and juice the lemon.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken thighs with ground black pepper and thyme.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, melt butter over medium heat. Add the seasoned chicken thighs and cook each side for about 7 minutes or until fully cooked. Remove from heat and let it rest before slicing.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, lightly sauté the red onion, tomato, and radish for about 5 minutes or until they are softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the paratha according to package instructions until golden and crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the bowl: Start with a base of sliced chicken, then add the sautéed vegetables. Top with gourmet tinapa, grated Parmesan cheese, sliced leek, and a squeeze of lemon juice over everything.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
